extension.description: Ever hosed your Kodi setup and wished you'd had your library and Watched status backed up? Now you can with one easy click. You can export your library, IMDb watch list, and watched list status to any source writeable by Kodi or directly to Dropbox cloud storage. Backups can be run on demand or via a scheduler.
